bug.author: kunmingg
bug.summary: kfctl 0.7 not working with v0.6 config
bug.description: /kind bug What steps did you take and what happened: Deploy v0.6.2 using kfctl on master: kfctl build -V -f https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/v0.6-branch/bootstrap/config/kfctl_gcp_basic_auth.0.6.2.yaml Error is: Error: couldn't generate KfApp: (kubeflow.error): Code 500 with message: coordinator Generate failed for gcp: Application default-install is missing What did you expect to happen: Anything else you would like to add: [Miscellaneous information that will assist in solving the issue.]

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label kind/bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.99. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/kubeflow/kubeflow>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.

I tried to reproduce this issue with kfctl binary for 0.7rc5 and config https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/v0.6-branch/bootstrap/config/kfctl_gcp_basic_auth.0.6.2.yaml I got a different error. kfctl keeps retrying the following <denchmark-code>Warning: apply should be used on resource created by either create --save-config or apply persistentvolumeclaim/minio-pv-claim created WARN[0074] Encountered error during apply: <nil> filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:183" WARN[0074] Will retry in 2 seconds. filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:184" </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/kunmingg>@kunmingg</denchmark-link> do you see this error before?
Downgrading to P1 because its not release blocking.
